name: radioactivity_concentration_of_130Sn_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Sn" means the element "tin" and "130Sn" is the isotope "tin-130" with a half-life of 2.57e-03 days.
